channel.title: How do I add specials? No one has helped me :( :( :( :( :( :( :(
channel.description: Recently I have wanted to add specials to a NON-dodian server. I have been looking around on moparscape, rune server, codersrus, moparisthebest(nothing good lol), Runelocus but I can't find anything. And please do NOT give me a link to the 98% piece of shit tutorial on rune server that tutorial is CRAP...Wow a little off topic lol well any help is good. And please don't do anything like 'U Soud Ty Dis! Go Der Yew Newb! [url=http://google.com]here[/url] I TRIED that nothing...For me...

item.title: How do I add specials? No one has helped me :( :( :( :( :( :( :(
item.dc:creator: @_The_One `The One
item.description:
@_The_One wrote:

It isn’t easy, there’s lots of other forums, I’m not allowed to link them to you though, but it isn’t hard to find a tutorial on this, I might have seen one in the TuT section.

Read full topic
